name: The Amazing Adventures of Lady Fanny Featherstone
description: Join the Lady Fanny Featherstone on her amazing adventures as she explores a lost island in this retro inspired puzzle platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP2 or better Processor: Dual Core 2.80 Ghz or higher Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia Geforce 8400GS or similar DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or better Processor: Quad core or higher Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nivida 850M or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
